sentences.en: Chlorosis The loss of chlorophyll from plants resulting in yellow ( chlorotic ) leaves.
sentences.cn: 缺绿病:由于缺乏叶绿素而导致植物叶片 萎 黄的现象.

sentences.en: Compound Iron Fertilizers had significant effects on rectifying peanuts chlorosis caused by iron deficiency.
sentences.cn: 复混铁肥土施矫治石灰性土壤花生缺铁黄化效果显著.

sentences.en: Copper deficiency results in chlorosis, suggesting that copper may be involved in the synthesis of chlorophyll.
sentences.cn: 它还存在于质体蓝素蛋白中, 和光合电子传递有关.

sentences.en: Hair and fair complexion, no pigmentation, dull complexion or chlorosis.
sentences.cn: 皮肤白皙, 无色素沉着, 肤色萎黄或晦暗.

sentences.en: Is it a lack of sulfur that causes chlorosis?
sentences.cn: 褪绿病是缺硫引起的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Major factors of the pear iron chlorosis were determined through soil testing and leaf analysis.
sentences.cn: 通过对酥梨缺铁黄化症的土壤分析、叶片分析来确定诱发黄化的主要因素.

sentences.en: The chlorosis develops from light yellow to tan, becoming brown and finally drying to a'scorch ".
sentences.cn: 褪绿部分由淡黄色演变为黄褐色以至褐色,最终变干呈“灼伤状 ”.

sentences.en: The chlorosis of camphor - tree is a common and serious disease in Shanghai city.
sentences.cn: 黄化病是当前上海香樟树最常见的病害.

sentences.en: The yield andand growth of longan and more worse which caused by the disease of chlorosis.
sentences.cn: 龙眼树黄化病,严重影响了植株的生长,导致产量下降,果品低劣.

trans.tran_en: a disorder, formerly common in adolescent girls, characterized by pale greenish-yellow skin, weakness, and palpitation and caused by insufficient iron in the body
